notes: GradientBoostingRegressor in sklearn Pipeline with median imputation. Provide any subset of features at inference time; missing values are imputed. Key direct inputs you can enter: effective_tariff_rate_pct, tariff_advalorem_pct, tariff_specific_inr_per_t, usd_inr, world_cpo_price_usd_per_t; plus optional crop context like nat_mature_ha, nat_cpo_prod_ton, etc.
